properties.swql:
SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 2

SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 2

SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 3

SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 3

SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 14

SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 14

SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 1

SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 1

SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 0

SELECT COUNT (A.ApplicationID) AS [Applications]
FROM Orion.APM.Application A
WHERE A.Status = 0

SELECT N.Caption AS [Node Name]
    , N.Status AS [Node Status]
    , N.DetailsUrl AS [Node Details]
    , N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
    , N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
    , N.Applications.DetailsUrl AS [Application Details]
    , N.CPULOad AS [Node CPU Load]
    , N.PercentMemoryUsed AS [Node Memory Used]
    , N.ResponseTime AS [Node Response Time]
    , N.PercentLoss AS [Node Packet Loss]
    , CASE 
        WHEN N.CustomProperties.BusinessCritical = 'True' THEN 'Yes' Else 'No'
    END AS [Business Critical Node]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Name != 'Null'

SELECT N.Caption AS [Node Name]
    , N.Status AS [Node Status]
    , N.DetailsUrl AS [Node Details]
    , N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
    , N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
    , N.Applications.DetailsUrl AS [Application Details]
    , N.CPULOad AS [Node CPU Load]
    , N.PercentMemoryUsed AS [Node Memory Used]
    , N.ResponseTime AS [Node Response Time]
    , N.PercentLoss AS [Node Packet Loss]
    , CASE 
        WHEN N.CustomProperties.BusinessCritical = 'True' THEN 'Yes' Else 'No'
    END AS [Business Critical Node]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Name != 'Null'

SELECT N.Caption AS [Node Name]
    , N.Status AS [Node Status]
    , N.DetailsUrl AS [Node Details]
    , N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
    , N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
    , N.Applications.DetailsUrl AS [Application Details]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Status = 2

SELECT N.Caption AS [Node Name]
    , N.Status AS [Node Status]
    , N.DetailsUrl AS [Node Details]
    , N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
    , N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
    , N.Applications.DetailsUrl AS [Application Details]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Status = 2

SELECT N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName AS [Component Name]
	, N.Applications.Components.DetailsURL AS [Componet Details]
	, N.Applications.Components.Status AS [Component Status]
	, N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
	, N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
	, N.Applications.DetailsURL AS [Application Details]
	, N.Caption AS [Node Name]
	, N.Status AS [Node Status]
	, N.DetailsURL AS [Node Details]
	, ROUND(N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentPercentMemory, 2) AS [Component Memory Used]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName != 'Null'

SELECT N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName AS [Component Name]
	, N.Applications.Components.DetailsURL AS [Componet Details]
	, N.Applications.Components.Status AS [Component Status]
	, N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
	, N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
	, N.Applications.DetailsURL AS [Application Details]
	, N.Caption AS [Node Name]
	, N.Status AS [Node Status]
	, N.DetailsURL AS [Node Details]
	, ROUND(N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentPercentMemory, 2) AS [Component Memory Used]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName != 'Null'

SELECT N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName AS [Component Name]
	, N.Applications.Components.DetailsURL AS [Componet Details]
	, N.Applications.Components.Status AS [Component Status]
	, N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
	, N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
	, N.Applications.DetailsURL AS [Application Details]
	, N.Caption AS [Node Name]
	, N.Status AS [Node Status]
	, N.DetailsURL AS [Node Details]
	, ROUND(N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentResponseTime, 2) AS [Component Response Time]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName != 'Null'

SELECT N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName AS [Component Name]
	, N.Applications.Components.DetailsURL AS [Componet Details]
	, N.Applications.Components.Status AS [Component Status]
	, N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
	, N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
	, N.Applications.DetailsURL AS [Application Details]
	, N.Caption AS [Node Name]
	, N.Status AS [Node Status]
	, N.DetailsURL AS [Node Details]
	, ROUND(N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentResponseTime, 2) AS [Component Response Time]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName != 'Null'

SELECT N.Caption AS [Node Name]
    , N.Status AS [Node Status]
    , N.DetailsUrl AS [Node Details]
    , N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
    , N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
    , N.Applications.DetailsUrl AS [Application Details]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Status != 1 OR N.Applications.Status != 2

SELECT N.Caption AS [Node Name]
    , N.Status AS [Node Status]
    , N.DetailsUrl AS [Node Details]
    , N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
    , N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
    , N.Applications.DetailsUrl AS [Application Details]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Status != 1 OR N.Applications.Status != 2

properties.title: Monitored Component by Virtual Memory Used

properties.swql:
SELECT N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName AS [Component Name]
	, N.Applications.Components.DetailsURL AS [Componet Details]
	, N.Applications.Components.Status AS [Component Status]
	, N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
	, N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
	, N.Applications.DetailsURL AS [Application Details]
	, N.Caption AS [Node Name]
	, N.Status AS [Node Status]
	, N.DetailsURL AS [Node Details]
	, ROUND(N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentPercentVirtualMemory, 2) AS [Component Virtual Memory Used]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName != 'Null'

SELECT N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName AS [Component Name]
	, N.Applications.Components.DetailsURL AS [Componet Details]
	, N.Applications.Components.Status AS [Component Status]
	, N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
	, N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
	, N.Applications.DetailsURL AS [Application Details]
	, N.Caption AS [Node Name]
	, N.Status AS [Node Status]
	, N.DetailsURL AS [Node Details]
	, ROUND(N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentPercentVirtualMemory, 2) AS [Component Virtual Memory Used]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName != 'Null'

widgets.name: Monitored Component by Virtual Memory Used

properties.title: Monitored Component by I/O Total Operations/s

properties.swql:
SELECT N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName AS [Component Name]
	, N.Applications.Components.DetailsURL AS [Componet Details]
	, N.Applications.Components.Status AS [Component Status]
	, N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
	, N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
	, N.Applications.DetailsURL AS [Application Details]
	, N.Caption AS [Node Name]
	, N.Status AS [Node Status]
	, N.DetailsURL AS [Node Details]
	, ROUND(N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentIOTotalOperationsPerSec, 2) AS [Component IOPS Total]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName != 'Null'

SELECT N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName AS [Component Name]
	, N.Applications.Components.DetailsURL AS [Componet Details]
	, N.Applications.Components.Status AS [Component Status]
	, N.Applications.Name AS [Application Name]
	, N.Applications.Status AS [Application Status]
	, N.Applications.DetailsURL AS [Application Details]
	, N.Caption AS [Node Name]
	, N.Status AS [Node Status]
	, N.DetailsURL AS [Node Details]
	, ROUND(N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentIOTotalOperationsPerSec, 2) AS [Component IOPS Total]
FROM Orion.Nodes N
WHERE N.Applications.Components.CurrentStatistics.ComponentName != 'Null'
